transcript:
Customer: Namaskar Mohan ko call karne ke liye dhanyavad.

Customer: Hello.

Executive: So very good afternoon Pravesh Sharma baat kar raha tha.

Customer: Ji good afternoon.

Executive: Ji ji sir maine na kal check karwaya jo miss call aapke phone pe ring nahi hua tha aur jo jinhone call kara hua tha right sir 9 tarikh ka jo aapka call tha 9 tarikh ko.

Customer: Ha theek hai aage bataiye.

Executive: Haan to sir 9 tarikh wala call na sir lead manager ne spam me mark kara gaya tha aapki taraf se.

Customer: Matlab aapne sir main kya puchta hu aap se aap kya kya dete ho.

Executive: Ji.

Customer: Main bolta hu jo bina ring aaye hue jo miss call dikhta hai wo kaise solve hoga spam ka kaam se chale gaye aap.

Executive: Main main wahi bata raha hu sir teen scenario maine aapki pichli teen call nikalwai wahi main aapko batane ke liye kar raha hu teen scenario.

Customer: Kya bata rahe ho usko to maine block kiya hai bhai jab bina ring hue bar bar miss call ho raha tha to maine block kiya hai uske baad uski miss call aayi nahi to uski to baat khatam ho gayi to wo kya samjha rahe ho aap mujhe.

Executive: Theek hai sir aap ek bar shanti se sunenge sir matlab aapko ye lag raha hai shayad matlab ek hi baat hazar bar chilla rahe ek hi baat hazar bar repeat kar rahe ho to kya shanti se sununga main.

Executive: Sir dusra dusra scenario ye tha jo ek do do call aapne aur di thi usme ye hai ki ek customer ne do second baad ring karke usko disconnect kar diya hai to is wajah se wo miss dikha raha hai sir.

Customer: To do second me kaise phone uthega aur kaise aapko pata chal raha hai ki do second sir sir do second me ring kar karke cut ho gaya kaise aapko pata chal raha hai aap kuch data dijiye mujhe.

Executive: Sir data isme main sir aapko fir kaise pata ki do second ring hua hai.

Executive: Sir maine team se baat kari hai na sir kuch main aapko team se matlab hawa me bolna hai aapko kuch to data back karega ki ha bhai yaha pe dekho do second sir main teen cheeze aapko batata hu do teen chezo maine unse complete pucha ki kis kis scenario me aisa hoga ki aapke me miss call aayegi hi nahi.

Customer: Sir unhone bataya call kaise hoga scenario mat samjhaiye jitne din se scenario hi samajh raha hu main.

Executive: Sir aap ek cheez bataiye kitni call aisi aayi hai sir aapko last ek mahine me sir kitni call aayi hai sir aisi.

Customer: Gin nahi sakta hu main train me baitha hu abhi gin ke nahi bata paunga baki 100 agar miss call hue hai usme se 80% miss call aapke system ke failure ke karan hua hai.

Executive: Sir agle agle agle 10 din agle agle 20 din agle 20 din aap mujhe bataiye kitni call aapke paas aayi hai sir.

Customer: Main aapko yahi bolna tha ki main ek ek track karta hu nahi nahi.

Executive: Sir ek do call sir aap 80% utha bhi to rahe ho sir sir sir 80% jo miss call hai aapke system failure ke karan dikh raha hai usko theek kariye fir matlab baat ko ghumaiye mat aap.

Executive: Sir glitch to main naye naye logo ko call itni hai kuch nahi hai.

Executive: Sir aap ek cheez mujhe bataiye agar samne wala do second me call karke disconnect kar raha hai to usko hum rok sakte hai sir wo kaise pata ki do second me aur kaise pata aapko ki do second me call disconnect hua hai.

Customer: Sir kis base pe keh rahe ho aap.

Executive: Sir true caller kis base pe keh rahe ho aap.

Executive: Sir jo jo number aapko miss me aapko call nahi hai jo hamare system me dikh raha hai aap daliye true caller pe unka spammer me naam aa raha hoga red me unka aa raha hoga.

Customer: Sir sir abhi main aap se kya puch raha hu fir aap kya jawab de rahe ho aap kis base pe keh rahe ho ki do second ring hoke call khatam ho gaya uska jawab dijiye mujhe aap.

Executive: Sir hamari hamari team ne bataya sir internal team ne bataya hai team se maine ka jawab mangta hu B pe aa jate ho aap B bolte ho B ka jawab mangta mangta hu C matter leke aa jate ho aap batao do second kaise aap jaan rahe ho ki do second ring ho raha hai.

Executive: Sir maine bataya to internal team ne check kara hai sir internal team ne check kara hai ha kaise kaise dekha hai aapne wo mujhe bhi dikhaiye na sir screenshot dijiye ya proof to bhejiye mujhe dikhaiye.

Executive: Sir internal data main aapko kaise dikha du sir aap ek cheez bataiye kaise hai sir aapko sir sir sir sir aap mujhe nahi dikhaoge mujhe kaise aap proof karoge ki ha bhai do second ring hua hai mere phone to ring hi nahi hua hai.

Executive: Sir jinka call miss hota hai aapke lead manager number dikhta hai aap unse puchiye ki unhone aapko call kara tha nahi kara.

Customer: Nahi nahi nahi sir main wo nahi janta hu sir sir sir main wo nahi janta hu ye aapka kaam hai aap usko solve kariye theek hai.

Executive: Sir aap ek cheez mujhe bataiye sir number to hum aapko dikha rahe hai na sir wo wala number jispe hua hai.

Customer: Sir dikha rahe hai wo theek hai to fir ye response rate jo aap app pe dikha rahe ho na usko band karo uska koi matlab nahi reh jata fir sir sir koi matlab nahi reh jata uska mera 100% hona chahiye sir mera 100% hona chahiye main har call uthata hu.

Executive: Sir har call sir impossible koi bhi 100% main uthaunga main uthaunga na mere liye possible hai ki nahi hai mere paas call hai main uthaunga karna meri problem hai.

Executive: Sir aap ek cheez mujhe bataiye sir kuch ek do call agar aisi hongi jo samne wala disconnect kar raha hai main aapko kya data dunga mujhe bataiye main aapko data kya main aapko main aapko number ke sath bata du ki wo ki kis wajah se hua hai is aap bol rahe the internal problem hai data dunga nahi.

Executive: Sir main aapko keh raha hu agar agar sir aap meri manenge nahi agar main data aapko dikha dunga aapka problem solve ho jayega usse aap mujhe bataiye aap mujhe bataiye agar main to main to sara problem solve karunga aap lekin aap do teen mahine se ghuma rahe ho kabhi koi phone karta hai kabhi koi phone karta hai kal fir se kal fir se sir meri baat suno meri baat suno kal fir se ek bande ne phone kiya wo puch raha hai kya problem hai sala din bhar baith ke main yahi bata raha hu sabko problem kya aa raha hai kya aa raha hai.

Executive: Sir aap ek cheez mujhe bataiye itne time se main connected hu aapki aapne mujhe do call bheji hai last ek mahine me main agar aap bolenge main aapko data bhi dikha deta hu but data dikhane se agar aapka problem solve hota hai main sabse pehle data hi dikhata sir samne wala agar do second teen problem solve kariye na fir matha kyu kha rahe hai problem solve kariye.

Executive: Sir problem matha chilla ke kyu bol raha hu puch rahe hai na itna frustrate kar chuke hai aap log ki chilla ke kyu bolna pad raha hai.

Executive: Ek cheez mujhe bataiye lakh diye hai humne aapko ek dedh lakh diye hai aise hi nahi aate hai ek cheez ek cheez meri baat suniye sir dekhiye aapko pata hai online platform me aaj kal kitne scams hote hai sir agar hum kisi buyer ko block kar dete hai na wo aapko call karega wo call bhai sahab kis cheez ki galat cheez fir galat baat bol rahe ho aap buyer ko maine block kiya hai aapne nahi kiya hai theek hai.

Executive: Sir hum bhi karte hai sir udhar udhar aapne nahi aap kar wo alag matter hai main puch raha hu mere number pe kyu show raha hai kehna chah raha hu usko theek kariye sirf buyer ko block kar rahe ho ye kar rahe ho wo kar rahe ho.

Executive: Sir meri baat to suniye main ye keh raha hu sir aapke alava India mart bhi daily basis pe jo buyers jaise kisi ka fraud karte hai to hum unhe apne yaha pe main kya puch raha hu sir sir main kya puch raha hu aap se main kya puch raha hu ki mere profile pe jo farzi miss call show hote hai wo kaise band hoga band karo usko main baki duniya ki 1000 cheeze nahi sunna chahta utna time nahi hai mere paas lakh diye teen din me do ghanta aap se discuss karu.

Executive: Sir ye band sir ye band ek do call jaha pe koi glitch kar raha hai samne wale ko usko hum kaise band kare aapka kaam hai nahi nahi aapka kaam hai sir sir aapka kaam hai usko aapko connect karo kyu failure ho raha hai kya kya problem aa rahi hai ya fir ye response rate dikhate ho aap sir sorry wo nahi kar sakte hum sir aap bataiye agar aap service continue karna chahte hai call mat kiya karo theek hai mat aap mat call kariye pe hota hai main aapko data mat call kariye mat call kariye nahi nahi fir mat call kariye aap mujhe main kitna bhi complaint karu aap call mat kariye aap nahi sunna chahte sir aap mujhe agle 20 din me whatsapp pe daliye kitna call aapke paas aaya main aapko pura report last time kya bola tha aapne.

Executive: Sir last time last time kya bola tha aapne ki main ek ek karke track karunga group bana raha hu Mohan ji aapke sath ek ek pe meri nazar rahegi lekin kya kiya aapne sala call pe call message pe message kar raha hu aap kuch respond hi nahi kar rahe ho.

Executive: Sir aapko respond kyu nahi kar raha sir maine same day aapko respond kara ek din maine phone nahi kara aapko aap khud dekhiye na sir aapne us din 7 baje mujhe call kara kaun sa group banaya aapne nahi kaun sa group banaya sir kaun sa group banaya aapne last time bola tha group bana ke main usko sir aap se to meri whatsapp pe baat ho rahi hai aapne mujhe aaj se 10 din pehle 7 baje sham me call kara tha kya maine aapka call nahi uthaya tha kya sir last time kya bola tha aapne 20 din me 20 din aapke sath me rehta hu ek ek track karta hu solve kar deta hu fir aap wahi baat bol rahe ho 20 din baad sir maine sir agar nahi hoga sun lo sun lo mere bhai mere bhai sun lo meri baat agar nahi ho pa rahi hai to mujhe bol do nahi hoga mere paas dobara call mat kar dena kisi se ho gaya main complaint karu ya kuch bhi karu call mat karo mujhe.

Executive: Sir aap ek cheez mujhe bataiye samne wala kisi bhi account manager ko kisi se bhi bhati se mat bolo ki call.

Executive: Sir aap bataiye main kaise roku aap suniye India mart ki koi agar India mart pe aa raha hai wo hamara place to nahi hai sir hum kaise rokenge use aap mujhe bataiye ek bar sir aap meri jagah aake bataiye ki isme ye solution hona chahiye aap mujhe solution suggest karo main aapke samne meri draft karke India mart ko dalta hu sir maine ye dala bhi hai ki kuch scenario me jaha pe spammer wala call aa raha hai maine ye propose already kara hai sir aapke mail se main aapko screenshot dalta hu mail ka ki hum isko exclude kare miss call se is data isko data se daloo daloo daloo sir pehle aap screenshot daloo main line pe hu fir aage baat karte hai.

Executive: Sir maine mail dalne ke liye abhi maine bola nahi nahi abhi abhi fir fir jhoot mat bolo jhoot mat bolo abhi kya aapne bola screenshot daloo daloo nahi daloo screenshot daloo matlab jhoot ka khazana ho aap log yaar turant ye bolte ho turant wo bolte ho.

Executive: Sir main aapko screenshot dekhta hu main screenshot maine ye record ho raha hai sir record record ho raha hai nahi nahi record ho raha hai aapne abhi bola aapne mujhe abhi bola ki maine mail dala hai aapko screenshot bhejta hu.

Executive: Sir aap meri ek cheez meri baat suniye sir aap 5:56 minute ho rahi hai aap isse pehle ek screenshot bhejo mujhe ki aapne kab mail dala hai.

Executive: Sir aap ek cheez mujhe bataiye jo main cheez propose kar raha hu jo main cheez propose kar raha hu ek jhoot 15000 to char naya jhoot bol do ek jhoot 15000 to char naya jhoot bol do.

Executive: Sir isme jhoot me sir mera isme aap mail na bhej ke ya ye cheez na karke main 10 10 phone record ho raha hai theek hai na record ho raha hai theek hai theek hai jitna jhoot bolna hai bolo sir main ye mail dal ke aapko abhi aapne bola hai ki main mail maine abhi aapne bola hai ki maine mail dala hai aapko screenshot bhejta hu.

Executive: Sir mail sir mail one second one second call hold kar raha hu ek urgent call aa raha hai.

: Aap jis vyakti se baat kar rahe hain, unhone aapke call ko hold par rakha hai. Kripya line par bane rahe. The person you are speaking with has put your call on hold. Please stay on the line.

: Aap jis vyakti se baat kar rahe hain, unhone aapke call ko hold par rakha hai. Kripya line par bane rahe. The person you are speaking with has put your call on hold.

Executive: Hello.

Executive: Ji sir aap mail bhejiye aap call pe rahiye main aapko abhi screenshot dal raha hu sir mail ka screenshot main dal raha hu main aapko mail ka screenshot dal deta hu aap ye samjhiye sir main aapki company ke liye hi kaam kar raha hu main company ke liye hi kaam kar raha hu sir mujhe email id hide karni padegi sir main aapse email id share nahi kar sakta hu but maine propose kya email id aap kya nahi kar sakte boss kya email id kya nahi kar sakte sir jo hamara internal department hai uska mujhe email id hide karna hoga wo main aap se share nahi kar sakta mat kariye kyu kyu kyu mujhe dene ka kya matlab hai tum aap kisi bhi kisi bhi bande ko mail kar doge.

Executive: Sir aap ek cheez mujhe bataiye sir main jisko dalunga ye problem agar aapko aayi kal ko kisi dusre ko bhi aa sakti hai main to as an process development ke liye dalunga na sir ye main sirf aapke liye mat karo baat kar rahe ho aap sir aap baat kar rahe ho email id hide karo email id hide karoge agar hide karoge to fir de doge mujhe saala 24 ghante ko de dunga de dunga.

Executive: Sir hum internal department ki nahi share kar sakte na aapke sath sir kya internal department logo ko main kya karunga sir sir hum nahi share kar sakte internal department ki kyu nahi share karoge company policy hai sir company policy hai internal department kya hai company ki kya hai sir maine aapko ye cheez to bata hi diya na nahi ho sakta hai dikhao dikhao dikhao aap mujhe kahan hai aisa policy kya cheez company ki policy aapne jo dikhao kahan hai aisa policy aap mail id hide kar screenshot bhejo sir har company ki policy policy policy written me bhi hota hai policy mujhe detail kahan likha hua hai ki aap screenshot bhejo aur mail id hide kar dijiye sir internal mail me main aapko nahi loop in kar sakta hu na main aap se share kar sakta bhai aapne aapne abhi bola aap aapne bola ki policy hai ye hamari to policy written me hoti hai aap uska jankari do kahan likha hua hai aapke policy me ki aap screenshot bhejoge aur mail id sir main aap se bol raha hu agar main aap se bol raha hu ki main share karunga bol to bhai sahab bol hazar cheez ho aap hazar cheez ho aap nahi rahe ho nahi rahe ho sir agar aap trust nahi karna chahte na wo aapka sir issue hai shayad aapko lag raha ho ki hum faltu me main aap se itna baat kar raha hu maine kitne time kharab kar rahe ho aap ek dam ek dam aap kharab kar rahe ho theek hai aap jitna bhashan karna hai bakwas karna hai karo aap sir agar agar agar maine baat nahi kari hoti to mujhe kaise pata lagta ki wo spam me hai aapne lead manager se usko block kara hai mere paas access nahi hai aapke lead manager ka maine check karwaya hai sir aapne nahi bola sir ek bari bhi recording line pe sab maine check karwaya ye ki jab mujhe pata laga aapne nahi nahi main main kya puch raha hu aap se ki miss call jo system mere phone me nahi aa rahi hai wo circulate mat karo ye bol raha hu fir tum block block ki baat nahi leke aate aapne bola aapne aapne bola circulate mat karo but usme koi beech me sir koi gateway nahi hota usme call aata hai to same time pe wo forward sir koi call hold nahi hota ki hamare paas pehle hold hota hai uske baad hum aapke paas circulate karte hai wo system same time pe forward karta hai sir aisa karo aap jo bhi mujhe kehna chahte ho mail karke bolo main mail pe dal deta hu theek hai aap jo bhi mujhe kehna cha rahe ho mail karo aap mujhe main kar deta hu main mail pe hi baat karte hai aap se mail karo aap mujhe bilkul kar deta hu bilkul mail karo aap mujhe
summary:
Concerns:

- Missed calls are showing without ringing.

- Wants to stop fake missed calls on profile.

- Response rate is showing on the app.



Resolution:

- Executive explained the reason for missed calls.

- Executive said he will share screenshot of mail.

- Executive said he cannot share internal email id.

- Executive said to share the issue on mail.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will share screenshot of mail.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- missed calls, spam, response rate, block
